text: Paolo Sorrentino (born 31 May 1970) is an Italian director and screenwriter. His movies include One Man Up (2001), The Consequences of Love (2004), The Family Friend (2006), Il Divo (2008), This Must Be the Place (2011) and The Great Beauty (2013). Sorrentino was born in Naples. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Movie people from Naples Category:Writers from Campania
title: Paolo Sorrentino
